data.eml:eml: Seven new species of Amphidraus Simon, 1900 (Araneae: Salticidae: Euophryini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Salgado, Alexandre, Ruiz, Gustavo R. S. (2019): Seven new species of Amphidraus Simon, 1900 (Araneae: Salticidae: Euophryini). Zootaxa 4563 (3): 451-481, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4563.3.3
